title: Hockey Dockey Christmas
description: Dramatic sneezing, toothpaste storage in the shower, ugly Christmas plates, and British vs. American PCs. Judge Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse clear out the docket.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
